data.actual_result: There is no Connect/Disconnect button ; no pfp of connected users ; there is a mark as read and a mute option ; and I can't edit bitrate/user limit when entering settings, instead I'm given tbe option to see pinned messages and change notification settings
data.expected_result: On the long press sheet I should be seeing a Connect to Voice button, if I'm connected I should be seeing a Disconnect button as well as the pfp of connected users, and I should certainly not be seeing option to mark as read and mute the voice channel. Entering settings should allow me to edit bitrate and user limit
data.short_description: Voice channels are treated as categories
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server with manage channel perms - Long press a voice channel - Notice the presence of a "mark as read" and "mute" option - Now enter settings
